title: Death, Limes and Videotape
description: *This is book 7 in the Key West Culinary Cozy Series* Marilyn is excited that her shop is next in line to be reviewed by a prominent national blogger, but her enthusiasm wanes when the blogger tries to bribe her. If she agrees to provide him with free pie for a lifetime, he’ll give her a positive review. If not, he’ll trash her reputation and do all that he can to destroy her business. When the reviewer ends up missing, Marilyn is under suspicion after having engaged in a bitter online battle with the man.
author: Summer Prescott
